com.isti.util.gui
Class IstiGridBagConstraints

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.GridBagConstraints
      com.isti.util.gui.IstiGridBagConstraints
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public class IstiGridBagConstraints
extends java.awt.GridBagConstraints

The IstiGridBagConstraints class specifies constraints for components that are laid out using the GridBagLayout class.

See Also:
Serialized Form
